meta.name: Campaign Play-Along
meta.description: Join the MythosBusters Discord server for the June 2025 Campaign Play-Along of The Circle Undone!
meta.author: CPA Organizers

cards.name: In the Thick of It
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, suffer 2 total physical and/or mental trauma. Then, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Hunted
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When the first Mythos phase of the game begins: Reveal cards from the top of the encounter deck until you reveal an enemy. Draw that card. Shuffle the encounter deck.

cards.name: Isolated
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation and only if there is a single investigator in the campaign.
Choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: See Beyond
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, add a random basic weakness to your deck. Then, choose a card cycle (such as Edge of the Earth.) That cycle is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Zealot's Sacrifice
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose either Core/Revised Core and Return to the Night of the Zealot, or the Investigator Starter Decks: remove the chosen set from your card pool for the duration of this campaign. Then, choose a card cycle (such as The Dream-Eaters or Edge of the Earth.) The chosen cycle is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Legacy of Dunwich
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Dunwich Legacy CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Dunwich Legacy expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Memories of Carcosa
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Path to Carcosa CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Path to Carcosa expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: The Colour of the Vale
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Feast of Hemlock Vale CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Feast of Hemlock Vale expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: Expedition Log
cards.text:
[reaction] When you complete the Edge of the Earth CPA: Announce your completion in the Mythos Busters Discord server. The next time you participate in a CPA, you may accept this contract.
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation. When you accept this contract, choose one card from the Edge of the Earth expansion. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: A Fate Avoided
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only during campaign creation. Do not play Scenario 0: Disappearance at the Twilight Estate. In the "Missing Persons" section of your Campaign Log, cross off all profiles. In your Campaign Log, record you are being hunted. When choosing investigators for this campaign, you must select from available Prologue Investigators (if any). You must use the Campaign Play-Along parallel back for each of these investigators.

cards.name: Weal and Woe
cards.text:
Permanent. Accept this contract only during deck creation.
When you accept this contract, add Damned and Observed to your deck (these cards do not cost experience).

cards.name: Loathsome Familiar
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract when assembling investigator decks. When you accept this contract, choose [per_investigator] cards. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When gathering cards during setup, gather Brown Jenkin and all three copies of Meddlesome Familiar from The Secret Name encounter set.

cards.name: Accept Your Fate
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only immediately after reading Intro 2 during Scenario I: The Witching Hour, and only if you have accepted your fate. When you accept this contract, instead of resolving the second bullet point of Intro 2, resolve the following: - Using the Tarot Deck, perform an 8-card Campaign Reading with these specific 8 cards, in this order: Death (Inverted); Strength; Wheel of Fortune; Lovers (Inverted); Empress; The High Priestess (Inverted); Tower; Stars (Inverted)

cards.name: Reject Your Fate
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only after resolving the intro to Scenario I: The Witching Hour, and only if you have rejected your fate. When you accept this contract, perform an 8-card Campaign Reading with these specific 8 cards, in this order: Death; Strength (Inverted); Wheel of Fortune (Inverted); Lovers; Empress (Inverted); The High Priestess; Tower (Inverted); Stars

cards.name: Doomed Fate
cards.text:
Ultimatum. Accept this contract only if you have performed an 8-card Campaign Reading.
Reverse each upright card in the Campaign Reading. Then, choose a card cycle (such as Edge of the Earth). That cycle is added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.name: In Memoriam
cards.text: Permanent. Accept this contract only after completing Scenario 0: Disappearance at the Twilight Estate, and only if your investigator did not disappear into the mist. Choose one card name. That card is added to your card pool for the duration of this campaign.

cards.back_flavor: A former member of the Haganah, Gavriella Mizrah now works private security for wealthy homeowners. Josef Meiger - a man who takes confidentiality quite seriously - has retained Gavriella to make sure there are no problems during tonight's event. But even she is not prepared for what is to come.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-3, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 random basic weakness. Bonus Experience: You begin the campaign with 8 additional experience (does not affect the number of weaknesses you must take in Standalone Mode).
cards.name: Gavriella Mizrah
cards.text:
[reaction] After an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Heal 1 damage and 1 horror.

cards.back_flavor: Jerome is Josef Meiger's personal assistant and secretary. He is a close friend of Josef's and is also an upstanding member of the Silver Twilight Lodge. He helps keep the Meiger estate's vast finances in order and manages Josef's time, which has become increasingly precious of late.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-3, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 random basic weakness. Bonus Experience: You begin the campaign with 8 additional experience (does not affect the number of weaknesses you must take in Standalone Mode).
cards.name: Jerome Davids
cards.text:
[reaction] When an investigator at your location draws a treachery from the encounter deck, discard cards from your hand with a total of at least 2 [intellect] icons: Cancel that card's revelation effect. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Discover 1 clue at your location.

cards.back_flavor: "Tino" is a wealthy philanthropist and one of tonight's most esteemed guests. The recipient of a fortuitous windfall, Valentino lives a life of luxury and recreation. Despite his wealth, he remains connected to his community, and he takes great joy in giving large sums of money to good causes.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-3, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 random basic weakness. Bonus Experience: You begin the campaign with 8 additional experience (does not affect the number of weaknesses you must take in Standalone Mode).
cards.name: Valentino Rivas
cards.text:
[free] During a skill test you are performing, spend 2 resources: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Gain 2 resources.

cards.back_flavor: Penny White is the Meiger estate's head housekeeper. She has been working in the Meiger estate for several years. Though she has only spoken with Josef a few times, his overly fastidious nature has kept her quite busy. Tonight, she is tasked with keeping the manor spotless, the food hot, and the hooch flowing.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 random basic weakness. Bonus Experience: You begin the campaign with 8 additional experience (does not affect the number of weaknesses you must take in Standalone Mode).
cards.name: Penny White
cards.text:
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test during a revelation effect: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If this is a skill test during a revelation effect, you may take an additional action during your next turn.

cards.name: Lodge Initiation
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only after resolving Interlude III: The Inner Circle. Choose one investigator to become the bearer of the The 13th Vision weakness (does not count towards deck size). Then, name a card with the [[Patron]] trait, a card with the [[Relic]] trait, and a card with the [[Pact]] trait. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When given the option, investigators must side with the lodge.

cards.name: Song of the Witches
cards.text: Ultimatum. Accept this contract only after resolving Interlude III: The Inner Circle. Choose one investigator to become the bearer of the Silver Twilight Acolyte weakness (does not count towards deck size). Then, name a card with the [[Witch]] trait, a card with the [[Ritual]] trait, and a card with the [[Augury]] trait. Those cards are added to the card pool for the duration of this campaign. Forced - When given the option, investigators must side with the coven.
